greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Squarefree kernel of 2*prime(n)+1.
link: Amiram Eldar, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..10000
mathematica: rad[n_] := Times @@ FactorInteger[n][[;;,1]]; rad /@ (2 * Select[Range[250], PrimeQ] + 1) (* _Amiram Eldar_, Sep 07 2020 *)
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Jun 11 2002
